response.job_title: MSc. Computational Fluid Dynamics | Mechanical Engineer
response.summary:
I am a person who is easy to work with in various environments, committed, a fast learner and a great co-worker. I always try to learn as much as possible about the problems I deal with, both on a personal and professional level, providing realistic solutions. During my professional experience, I've worked on machine design using CAD tools in factories and start-ups, additionally, I've been able to be part of large projects such as the expansion of the Salitre Water Waste Treatment Plant (WWTP) in Bogota, Colombia.

The fundamental role of Computational simulations in engineering drove me to pursue MSc in Computational Fluid Dynamics (CFD) at Cranfield University where I made use of various tools such as OpenFoam, ANSYS Fluent, Pointwise, Tecplot, etc. during a number of projects. I'm looking for challenges where I can put my knowledge to use, improve it and while doing so have a great multidisciplinary team.
response.skills: Pointwise, Trabajo en equipo, Pensamiento lógico y rápido, Autodesk Inventor (CAD), Adaptabilidad, Diseño asistido por ordenador (CAD), Autodesk Inventor, Elementos finitos

profile_positions.description:
• Design of mechanical components aimed to be part of a linear motion mechanism which plays an important role in a measurement device
• Assembly of prototype and Minimum Viable Product
• 3D Printing of mechanical components and cases, mainly using PLA, to protect electronic devices
profile_positions.title: Mechanical Engineer

profile_positions.description: Design, elaboration of manufacturing drawings and installation of steel brackets aimed to hold weight sensors meant to measure the capacity of public transport buses in Bogota, Colombia.
profile_positions.title: Mechanical Engineer

profile_positions.description: Scheduling the contractors' activities that are to be carried out during the week, monitoring their progress and reporting the results achieved. Additionally, the necessary tools were given to the contractors in case of an absence of such so the contractors could carry out their CS or SS piping assembly for the wastewater transport.
profile_positions.title: Junior Mechanical Engineer

profile_positions.description: Design of components of two new machines which aim to increase the production of plastic bottle caps, specifically in the bending and pre-cut stages. The existing machines are taken as an inspiration for the new designs.
profile_positions.title: Industrial Designer

education.degree_name: Master of Science - MS, Computational Fluid Dynamics

company.name: Arup
company.description: Dedicated to sustainable development, Arup is a collective of designers, consultants and experts working across 140 countries. Founded to be both humane and excellent, we collaborate with our clients and partners using imagination,  technology and rigour to shape a better world.
